name: Classic Carbonara With Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions, adding peas in the last minute of cooking. Drain, reserving 1/4 cup cooking liquid.
Meanwhile, whisk eggs and parmesan in a medium jug until combined. Season.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook pancetta, stirring, for 5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Add pasta mixture and egg mixture, tossing over low heat, ensuring you donâ€™t overheat the pasta, until well combined and add reserved cooking liquid if sauce is too thick.
Scatter over extra parmesan and serve.
